data.title: Movie extras needed for Dean Cain film in Ann Arbor
data.meta_description: Dean Cain searching for movie extras in the Ann Arbor area for a parade and manor shoot on Monday, May 21.
data.text:
Want to see your face on the silver screen?

Dean Cain, actor, director and producer, is searching for movie extras in the Ann Arbor area for a shoot Monday, May 21.

Cain is starring in a film called "Faith Under Fire," which is being produced and directed by Joel Paul Reisig.

The extras are needed for a parade shoot as well as at the manor house of Concordia University, so as many people as possible are being asked to take part in it.

The blurb for the extras call reads: "MOVIE EXTRAS NEEDED: Monday, May 21, Ann Arbor area for a parade shoot and at the Manor house at Concordia University. If you can help, please email Melissa: generationcourage@gmail.com.‚Äù

Cain, 51 was born Dean George Tanaka in Mt. Clemens, according to his IMDb page. He is known for playing Clark Kent/Superman in the "Lois & Clark: The New Adventures of Superman" series in 1993.

More: Michigan AD wants Jim Harbaugh, John Beilein to stay until retirement

More: Squirrels stash 50 pounds of pine cones in Michigan man's car engine

Contact Brandon Patterson: BPatterson2@freepress.com. Follow him on Twitter: @iAmBrandonPatt
